title: Craft Silicon and MindHYVE.ai Forge Strategic Partnership to Deploy Agentic AI Across Africa's Workforce and Education Systems
description: **media[745237]**NAIROBI, Kenya and NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., Sept. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Craft Silicon Ltd., a leading global fintech innovator headquartered in Nairobi, and MindHYVE.ai, Inc., a pioneer in agentic artificial intelligence (AGI), announced a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to introduce ArthurAI™, a next-generation autonomous learning platform, into African markets.**media[745238]**

title: US inquiry into AI chatbots becoming teen 'companions'
description: Several social media and artificial intelligence companies will face a US inquiry into the potential harm for children using their AI chatbots as companions.
content:
The potential harm to children and teenagers who use their AI chatbots as companions will come under scrutiny from the US Federal Trade Commission.
The Commission has sent letters to Google parent Alphabet, Facebook and Instagram parent Meta Platform... [3209 chars]

title: Microsoft to Put More Computing Power Behind In-House AI Models
description: Microsoft Corp. plans to expand its physical infrastructure to train its own artificial intelligence models that it hopes will be competitive with OpenAI, Anthropic and other firms.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Microsoft Corp. plans to expand its physical infrastructure to train its own artificial intelligence models that it hopes will be competitive with OpenAI, Anthropic and other firms.

title: Microsoft, OpenAI Reach Early Agreement in For-Profit Change
description: OpenAI and its largest investor, Microsoft Corp., have reached a preliminary agreement about the structure of their partnership, a move that could pave the way for the artificial intelligence startup’s plan to restructure into a more traditional for-profit company.

title: AI financial advice not always right on the money
description: As Australians take up artificial intelligence tools for financial guidance, experts say people should remain cautious of the advice.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Health Sector Headlines: Drug Withdrawals, AI Devices, and Job Cuts
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
